system.description:
“Master this utterance and inflict doubt upon the victims of your scorn. This is how you will transcend violence.” You utter Ba·La·Sik: the surat inscribed upon the air, you weaken your target.

Prereq: Fey Buddha Glossolalia

Spend 1 Beat to weaken a fighter: Inflict 1 Hit and BRV Down (2) or FTH Down (2) to a fighter in range 4.

Vicious Mantra: +1 Beat to inflict BRV Down (2) + FTH Down (2) instead.

Flensing Mantra: +1 Beat: Inflict Sunder (2) on the target as well.
